author: Play On Tabletop
description:
In this Preseason Match we determine who will fight in the first games of the Upcoming NEW season. For rules and more info https://playontabletop.com/king-of-the-colosseum/

The next series for King of the Colosseum brings the best elements of the last few seasons with the addition of narrative elements, interactive terrain, and a new battle zone. Ocean, the latest battle set produced by Frontline Gaming has been unveiled at LVO XII and will be available online soon.

King of the Colosseum Battle Sets are available from these sources!
In the US: https://store.frontlinegaming.org/collections/flg-terrain
CAN and Worldwide: https://merch.playontabletop.com/

In this set of games we determine who will be the first fighters in the upcoming season. The winner of bout 1 between Nick's T'au and Tycho's Death Guard will face the winner of the match between Tak's Ultramarines and Mubin's Adeptus Custodes in that first battle. 

MB01LPAYRDMMHH4
title: Pre Season King of the Colosseum Matches! T'au, Death Guard, Ultramarines, and Custodes.
